sub_title: Executive Leadership | Business Transformation | Strategy & Operations | Customer Focus | Leadership coaching
summary:
With over 13+ years of experience in various roles across operations & supply chain, strategy, business transformation, sales and marketing, I offer a unique and versatile skill set and perspective on identifying business growth opportunities. My strength is my ability to look at the bigger picture to identify gaps and opportunities to meet the current and future business needs and develop plans and strategies to improve efficiency and execute upon them. With advanced skills in leading high-impactful, cross-functional teams across the world, I'm able to inspire and lead by example to deliver business impact.

I am an innovative, agile, and results-oriented leader with a strong customer-first mindset, experienced in delivering successful strategy, product and process solutions.

school.name: WSB Schools of Banking in Poland
West Pomeranian University of Technology in Szczecin

profile_positions.description:
Being part of the CT/AMI management team, supporting business leaders in defining strategic direction to deliver on savings and quality targets, build unique capabilities and support delivery against KPIs and Business & Cluster Strategy. Coaching and mentoring business leaders on Lean and Change Management.

Key areas of responsibilities and achievements:

- Structured and currently overseeing E2E execution of CT/AMI Transformation portfolio incl. R&D footprint changes incl. program management and change management aspects.

- Coordinating and overseeing deployment of new organisation design for CT/AMI 

- Shaping CT ISC Strategy (2023-2025 Transformation roadmap) including short-mid term tactical priorities and detailing out initiatives in areas of E2E ecosystem & footprint, S&OP/S&OE Planning, Productivity, Supply Base de-risking and Design for Supply Chain with business case underpinning, governance structure and performance management setup.

- As a side assignment: taking the lead in the Cardiology VPC development with aim to provide a portfolio approach that guides decision making and enables teams to define their specific way to deliver on the value proposition for their customer segment.
profile_positions.title: Director Business Transformation Computed Tomography
Director of Business Transformation Personal Health, Consumer Health JV and Cluster Marketing
Business Transformation Leader Personal Health & Beauty

profile_positions.description:
Global LEAN transformation management for service and manufacturing in a medical organization (part of WDH group/Demant), Program Portfolio Manager & CI trainer.

Key responsibilities and achievements:

- Led deployment of automation in manufacturing of ITE hearing instruments in Turkey (from manual to 3D printing) incl. deployment of new processes for manufacturing, layouts and trainings; Project resulted with increased productivity (+20%) and significant improvement in quality (+46% in line, -28% complaint rate in first 6 months); Project was completed 3 months ahead of planned schedule.

- Led Hoshin Program for Operations and designed new global process for returns & refurbishment, to deliver on productivity targets while ensuring compliance to regulatory requirements; Designed layouts for manufacturing & service processes;

- Set up and led PMO office with Projects Portfolio for Global Technology and Engineering department (global manufacturing and service)

- Led series of improvement workshops for Project Managers leading product and platform development (NPI) programs to improve performance and quality of deliverables.
profile_positions.title: Lean Program Manager Global Technology and Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Encouraging business development and implementation of lean management in the company specializing in solutions for mobile architecture for the event industry around the world.

Key responsibilities and achievements:

- Designed and introduced several lean improvements in areas of design, manufacturing, supply chain and project management to further improve Customer satisfaction, drive productivity and unlock scaling of the business.

- Team Leader for multi-functional teams dedicated to new sub-brand development (Sales, Marketing, Communication, Design, Procurement, Manufacturing)

- Led development and scaling of sub brand (F.Domes) including product design, cost structure, sales, and marketing strategy.

- In charge of market analytics (market trends, customer needs and competitor landscape etc) to determine product features, benefits, shortfalls, and market success.
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
Managing sales and marketing department for a start-up company specializing in production of passive houses on Polish and Swedish market. Product development and lean management.

Key responsibilities and achievements: 

- Team Leader for multi-functional teams (Sales, Marketing, Design, Construction) across multiple geographies (Poland, Sweden, Gemany, Norway) incl. external agencies

- Ensured execution of defined process for E2E projects delivery (house design - architecture, construction plans, installations, manufacturing, and assembly)

- Led development and launch of new brand (ERH / EcoReadyHouse) incl. sales, pricing & marketing strategy for key markets (Poland, Sweden, Germany, Norway) 

- Build and nurture long-term relationships with key customers 

- Build effective sales organization (incl. agents) in Poland and Sweden
profile_positions.title: Chief Sales and Marketing Officer

profile_positions.description:
In my  Product Manager role I was initially focused around research & analysis of the market trends (including competitors landscape) which I then translated into product development plans as well as development and implementation of broader product strategy. 

Key responsibilities and achievements:

- Defined and led business optimization projects in areas of design, manufacturing, supply chain and  project management to further improve productivity and profitability.

- In charge of research and analysis of market trends, customer needs and competitor landscape to determine overall product strategy: features, benefits, shortfalls, and market success (Europe).

- Designed and structured a project-based approach with clear RACI for E2E projects execution (house design - architecture, construction plans, installations, manufacturing, and assembly)
